pullRequest.title: FM2-2 Task Resource CREATE and UPDATE implementation work
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of what I changed


Implement CREATE and UPDATE functionality for the FHIR Task resource.
Issue I worked on




see https://issues.openmrs.org/browse/FM2-2
Checklist: I completed these to help reviewers :)




 My pull request only contains ONE single commit.
No? -> read here on how to squash multiple commits into one


 My IDE is configured to follow the code style of this project.
No? Unsure? -> configure your IDE, format the code and add the changes with git add . && git commit --amend


 I have added tests to cover my changes. (If you refactored
existing code that was well tested you do not have to add tests)
No? -> write tests and add them to this commit git add . && git commit --amend


 I ran mvn clean package right before creating this pull request and
added all formatting changes to my commit.
No? -> execute above command


 All new and existing tests passed.
No? -> figure out why and add the fix to your commit. It is your responsibility to make sure your code works.


 My pull request is based on the latest changes of the master branch.
No? Unsure? -> execute command git pull --rebase upstream master

nodes.bodyText: As I mentioned above, I think we should not be supplying the taskId here.

nodes.bodyText: We don't need the public modifier in an interface. Can you also change this for the other two methods here?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -32,4 +32,12 @@
 	 */
 	public Task saveTask(Task task);
 	
+	/**
+	 * Save task to the DB
+	 * 
+	 * @param task the task to save
+	 * @return the saved task
+	 */
+	public Task saveTask(String uuid, Task task);

nodes.bodyText:
This can be implemented as a one-liner:
return translator.toFhirResource(dao.saveTask(translator.toOpenmrsType(task)));
return translator.toFhirResource(dao.saveTask(translator.toOpenmrsType(openmrsTask, task)));
I think we'd prefer the "shouldRetrieveTaskByUuid" terminology to stay consistent with other tests.
Not that it's harmful, but we don't need this if we aren't using the @Mock annotation
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -22,10 +23,16 @@
 @RunWith(MockitoJUnitRunner.class)

nodes.bodyText: Can we organize these imports so all the hamcrest one's are together followed by the junit one?
We should also assert the value of intent.
These two lines shouldn't be necessary for this test.
We should add a similar test without having a status or intent set on the task.
We should add a similar test without having a status or intent set on the task.

nodes.bodyText:
I think this should be UpdateTask instead
Regardless of using dao.saveTask() the method does update the existing Task
You should also change also here

nodes.bodyText: Don't  you guys think that maybe we can stick to the same approach being used in openmrs core and openmrs modules where same save method is used for both save and update?
